title: Align signals — get_sigalign
text: Align signals plot.

title: Align signals — get_sigalign
code: get_sigalign(   sig1,   sig2,   min.overlap = round(0.75 * min(length(sig1), length(sig2))),   ifplot = FALSE,   name1 = "Cut1",   name2 = "Cut2",   legendname = "Signal",   titlename = NULL )

title: Align signals — get_sigalign
text: sig1 first signal vector sig2 second signal vector min.overlap additional parameter passed bulletxtrctr::get_ccf ifplot whether graphs displayed name1 name first cut name2 name second cut legendname legend name titlename title name

what: Rotate imputed x3p object to vertical direction — get_x3p_bin_rotate
title: Rotate imputed x3p object to vertical direction — get_x3p_bin_rotate
text: Rotate imputed x3p object striations vertical direction.

title: Rotate imputed x3p object to vertical direction — get_x3p_bin_rotate
code: get_x3p_bin_rotate(   x3p_inner_impute,   freqs = c(0, 0.3, 0.7, 1),   method = "MLE",   ntheta = 720,   min_score_cut = 2,   ifplot = FALSE,   loess_span = 0.2 )

title: Rotate imputed x3p object to vertical direction — get_x3p_bin_rotate
text: x3p_inner_impute imputed x3p object freqs length 4 vector values corresponding color frequency (turned quantiles differenced values) used x3ptools::x3p_bin_stripes method choice MLE quantile computing rotation angle ntheta number bins along theta used imager::hough_line min_score_cut tuning parameter minimum scores required hough transformation ifplot whether graphs displayed loess_span parameter controls degree smoothing, available method = MLE

title: Impute the inner polygon — get_x3p_inner_impute

title: Impute the inner polygon — get_x3p_inner_impute
code: get_x3p_inner_impute(   x3p,   mask_col = "#FF0000",   concavity = 1.5,   ifsave = FALSE,   dir_name = NULL,   ifplot = FALSE )

title: Impute the inner polygon — get_x3p_inner_impute
text: x3p x3p object mask_col colour polygon concavity strictly positive value used concaveman::concaveman ifsave whether imputation procedure gif going saved dir_name required ifsave TRUE ifplot whether graphs displayed
